function new_item()
  item = {}
  item.itemsn = ''
  item.name = ''
  item.flags = {}
  item.fullflags = ''

  item.hum = false
  item.glow = false
  item.invis = false
  item.magical = false
  item.keep = false
  item.burn-proof = false

  item.resonate = false
  item.solidify = false
  item.precious = false
  item.auctioned = false
  item.donated = false
  item.noshare = false
  item.nolocate = false
--]]
  item.v3 = false
  item.level = -1
  item.type = -1
  item.location = -1
  item.locationstring = ''
  item.timer = -1
  item.weight = -1
  item.value = -1
  item.score = -1
  item.fromclanname = ''
  item.foundat = ''
  item.statmods = {}
--[[
  item.wisdom = 0
  item.strength = 0
  item.intelligence = 0
  item.constitution = 0
  item.dexterity = 0
  item.luck = 0
  item.hitroll = 0
  item.damroll = 0
  item.moves = 0
  item.hitpoints = 0
  item.mana = 0
--]]
  item.resistmods = {}
  -- key will be resist, value will be mod
    
  item.skillmods = {}
  -- key will be skillnumber, value will be mod
  
  item.affectmods = {}
  -- key will be mod, value will be nothing
  
  item.weapon = false
  item.weaponstuff = {}
--[[
  item.weapon = false
  item.weapontype = ''
  item.weapondamage = 0
  item.weaponinflicts = ''
  item.weapondamtype = ''
  item.weaponspecials = ''
--]]
  
  item.furniture = false
  item.furniturestuff = {}
  -- furniturestuff will have mana, move, hp, regen rate
  
  item.container = false
  item.containerstuff = {}
  -- containerstuff will have 
  
  return item
end
